docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, June 12 (AP)--A responsible government source reported tonight that the Mexican Government had requested Arthur Dietrich, chief of the press bureau of the German Legation and a director of German propaganda in Mexico, to leave the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, June 12 (AP)--A responsible government source reported tonight that the Mexican Government had requested Arthur Dietrich, chief of the press bureau of the German Legation and a director of German propaganda in Mexico, to leave the country as soon as possible.
